name: part_006
file: tmp_【#ときのそらお披露目生誕祭】アイドルになりたいわたしの生誕祭！【ホロライブ⧸ときのそら】 [gL6HizKO-Gc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Tokino Sora performs 'Shiny Smily Story (2022 ver.)' on stage.
MC section where Tokino Sora shows off her new costume to the viewers.

subtitles.original: ホロライブ！
subtitles.english: Hololive!

subtitles.original: どこを見ても真っ暗な場所に目ん食らってた
subtitles.english: Everywhere I looked, I was blinded by the darkness

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな希望にこの瞳は奪われた
subtitles.english: But then my eyes were captured by a tiny glimmer of hope

subtitles.original: 不安で揺れる心をうまくチューニングして
subtitles.english: Tuning my heart, which was shaking with anxiety

subtitles.original: ほんの小さな勇気を振り絞ってみたよ
subtitles.english: I tried to squeeze out every last bit of courage

subtitles.original: 諦める文字デリートして進む
subtitles.english: Deleting the word "give up," I move forward

subtitles.original: 苦しい時ももう私は一人じゃないから
subtitles.english: Because even when things are tough, I'm not alone anymore

subtitles.original: だからもっと夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: So I want to chase my dreams even more

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: My heart won't stop racing

subtitles.original: どこどこ超えてく 世界見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that goes beyond anywhere

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try and access it

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let you have any regrets

subtitles.original: これこれ誓った心で走れゴー
subtitles.english: With this heart that has made its vow, run and go!

subtitles.original: 仮想の空に輝く眩しい思いは
subtitles.english: These dazzling feelings shining in the virtual sky

subtitles.original: 見たことのない光をリアルに届けるよ
subtitles.english: Will deliver a light never seen before to the real world

subtitles.original: いつも聞こえるエールはここにキャプチャして
subtitles.english: Capturing all the cheers I always hear right here

subtitles.original: また新しい光を探したくなるよ
subtitles.english: It makes me want to search for a new light once again

subtitles.original: 君の笑顔を保存して進む
subtitles.english: Saving your smiles as I move forward

subtitles.original: 悲しい時に見返すよ力が沸くから
subtitles.english: I'll look back at them when I'm sad, because they give me strength

subtitles.original: 胸を張って夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: I want to chase my dreams with pride

subtitles.original: キセキのストーリー
subtitles.english: A miraculous story

subtitles.original: 一緒に作ろう終わらない夢を
subtitles.english: Let's create an endless dream together

subtitles.original: 誰一人欠かせない
subtitles.english: This world where love waits,

subtitles.original: 愛が待ったこの世界
subtitles.english: where no one is left behind

subtitles.original: これこれ誓った心で彩れ
subtitles.english: Paint it with this heart that has made its vow

subtitles.original: みんな、今日は一緒に見てくれてありがとう！お誕生日のお祝いも嬉しいよー！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you for watching with me today! I'm so happy about the birthday wishes!

subtitles.original: 悲しい時も 寂しい時も
subtitles.english: Whether it's sad times or lonely times

subtitles.original: 信じ合える思いがある
subtitles.english: There are feelings we can believe in together

subtitles.original: 忘れずにこの鼓動鳴らし続けたい
subtitles.english: Without forgetting, I want to keep this heartbeat sounding out

subtitles.original: 終わらない世界に溢れ出すよ
subtitles.english: Overflowing into this endless world

subtitles.original: 笑顔たち
subtitles.english: Our smiles

subtitles.original: 憧れの舞台立ちたい
subtitles.english: I want to stand on the stage of my dreams

subtitles.original: らしく輝きたい
subtitles.english: I want to shine in my own way

subtitles.original: 時には涙してまた笑い合いたい
subtitles.english: Sometimes crying, but wanting to laugh together again

subtitles.original: どんな未来も見たい
subtitles.english: I want to see whatever the future holds

subtitles.original: あの夢手にしたい
subtitles.english: I want to grasp that dream

subtitles.original: 踏み出そうキセキの一歩を
subtitles.english: Let's take that miraculous step forward

subtitles.original: 息切らして夢追いかけたい
subtitles.english: Chasing my dreams even if I'm out of breath

subtitles.original: ワクワク止まらない
subtitles.english: My heart won't stop racing

subtitles.original: どこどこ超えてく 世界見せてあげる
subtitles.english: I'll show you a world that goes beyond anywhere

subtitles.original: アクセスしてみたい
subtitles.english: I want to try and access it

subtitles.original: 後悔なんてここにない
subtitles.english: There are no regrets here

subtitles.original: これこれ誓った心で作るわ
subtitles.english: I'll create it with this heart that has made its vow

subtitles.original: というわけで、シュシュっとShiny Smily Story、
subtitles.english: And with that, I sang "Chu-Chu-Lu"

subtitles.original: 2曲続けて歌いました！
subtitles.english: and "Shiny Smily Story" back-to-back!

subtitles.original: まずはこちらの新衣装のお披露目になりますね。
subtitles.english: First of all, it's time to reveal this new costume.

subtitles.original: どうですか？
subtitles.english: How do you like it?

subtitles.original: ねえ、見て見て見て！これさ、
subtitles.english: Hey, look, look, look! You see this?

subtitles.original: まずこちらの衣装ではスカートに星がつくんですよ。
subtitles.english: First, for this costume, there are stars on the skirt.

subtitles.original: ねー、可愛いでしょ。
subtitles.english: Right? It's cute, isn't it?

subtitles.original: あと足ですね。
subtitles.english: And then my legs.

subtitles.original: 足。このブーツ。
subtitles.english: My legs. These boots.

subtitles.original: こっち羽もあるブーツ。
subtitles.english: These boots even have wings on them.

subtitles.original: そして、こう、ふって上がってくると、こっち側が白系、
subtitles.english: And then, as you move up... this side is white,

subtitles.original: こっち側がピンク。
subtitles.english: and this side is pink.

subtitles.original: ねぇねぇ、ちょっとアシンメトリーだけど
subtitles.english: See, it's slightly asymmetrical,

subtitles.original: とっても可愛い感じ。
subtitles.english: which I think is really cute.

subtitles.original: 全体的にね、ピンクですね。
subtitles.english: It's pink all over.

subtitles.original: そしてここの胸んとこリボンもありますし。
subtitles.english: And there's a ribbon here on the chest, too.

subtitles.original: なんとお耳にはあん肝がついていますよと。
subtitles.english: And would you believe it, Ankimo is right here on my ear!

subtitles.original: リボンもピンク！
subtitles.english: The ribbon is pink, too!

subtitles.original: 全部ピンク！可愛いでしょ！
subtitles.english: Everything is pink! Isn't it cute?

subtitles.original: だからほら、
subtitles.english: So, you see...
